trends: There has been one other sighting in Danville
There were no other sightings in Danville on or around December 5th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsFlashing object in the sky. Multiple super bright lights that would strobe in a sequence. After we saw it it disappeared after 20-25 seconds. It was big, . After it was gone air traffic got super heavy then died down. But the weird part was after it was gone We could hear boom's all around us like a low audible constant sonic booms. From different directions close at first then traveled further away.
Summary: Huge object made a triangle shape with its lights.
